docs.lead_paragraph: Triennial Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church. SEVENTEENTH DAY. The Convention reassembled at 9 o'clock, yesterday.
docs.snippet: Triennial Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church. SEVENTEENTH DAY. The Convention reassembled at 9 o'clock, yesterday.

headline.main: THE HENRY CLAY CATASTROPHE.; Trial of the Owners and Officers of the Henry Clay. UNITED STATES CIRCUIT COURT.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Hon. Judge Ingersoll. SEVENTH DAY. The People of the United States against Thomas Collyer, John F. Tallman, John Germain, Ed ward Hubbard, James L. Jessup, James Elmendorf and Charles Merritt.
docs.snippet: Before Hon. Judge Ingersoll. SEVENTH DAY. The People of the United States against Thomas Collyer, John F. Tallman, John Germain, Ed ward Hubbard, James L. Jessup, James Elmendorf and Charles Merritt.

docs.lead_paragraph: There were buried, last week, twenty per sons more than the week preceding. Yet bowel complaints are decreasing,--a very pleasant fact in view of any possible arrival of the Cholera from Europe,--and the cases of fever are not increased. The increase of fatal cases of consumption was 28, of convulsions 7, and of dropsies in the head, 6.

headline.main: THE SOUTH.; Letters on the Productions, Industry, and Resources of the Slabe States. NUMBER FORTY-ONE.

byline.original: SPECIAL CORRESPONDENCE OF THE N.Y. DAILY TIMES

headline.main: Arrival of the Ship Sagadahack below Boston--Ship on Fire.

docs.lead_paragraph: The ship Sagadahock on board of which 70 deaths from cholera have been reported, is below this city. The Mayor and Aldermen held a special meeting this morning, and passed an order for the Committee on Internal Health to take such measures that the danger from its approach may be averted from the city.

headline.main: NATIONAL EXHIBITION OF HORSES.; Imposing Spectacle. GRAND PROCESSION OF FOUR HUNDRED HORSES TRIALS OF SPEED. TRIALS OF SPEED. AGRICULTURAL BANQUET. ADDRESS OF HON. MARSHALL P. WILDER, Speech of Gov. Seymour of New-York. Addresses of Hon. Abbott Lawrence, Ex-Governor Floyd, Hon. John M. Botts, and others. PREMIUMS AWARDED. THE BANQUET. Highly Interesting Paoceedings. GREAT GATHERING OF THE PEOPLE. List of Premiums.

docs.lead_paragraph: This morning the managers of the Exhibition gratified the desire generally expressed for a grand procession of all the horses entered, numbering over four hundred. The weather continued beautifully fine, and by 9 o'clock the stands were crowded with spectators.
docs.abstract: Complimentary op. to Mass. Men at Springfield
